title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. However, they can be moved around, but they do not have any effect. When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
